00008 #include "CFlash.h"
00009 #include "../../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00010 
00011 CFlash::CFlash(Uint32 msecs, Uint8 speed, Uint32 color) :
00012 m_StartTime(g_pTimer->getTicks()),
00013 m_RunTime(msecs),
00014 m_Speed(speed),
00015 m_Color(color),
00016 m_Alpha(0),
00017 m_FadeDir(FADE_IN),
00018 m_Style(FADE_PULSE),
00019 m_MaxAlpha(255),
00020 mp_FadeSurface(SDL_DisplayFormat(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface))
00021 {
00022  SDL_FillRect(mp_FadeSurface, NULL, m_Color);
00023 }
00024 
00025 CFlash::CFlash(Uint32 msecs, Uint8 speed, Uint32 color, Uint8 m_maxalpha) :
00026 m_StartTime(g_pTimer->getTicks()),
00027 m_RunTime(msecs),
00028 m_Speed(speed),
00029 m_Color(color),
00030 m_Alpha(0),
00031 m_FadeDir(FADE_IN),
00032 m_Style(FADE_NORMAL),
00033 m_MaxAlpha(m_maxalpha),
00034 mp_FadeSurface(SDL_DisplayFormat(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface))
00035 {
00036  SDL_FillRect(mp_FadeSurface, NULL, m_Color);
00037 }
00038 
00039 // Process the flashing effect here
00040 void CFlash::process()
00041 {
00042  Uint32 ElapsedTime = g_pTimer->getTicks() - m_StartTime;
00043  SDL_Rect gamerect = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution();
00044 
00045  SDL_SetAlpha(mp_FadeSurface, SDL_SRCALPHA, m_Alpha);
00046 
00047  // Blit it and free temp surface
00048  SDL_BlitSurface(mp_FadeSurface, &gamerect, g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface, &gamerect);
00049 
00050  if(m_FadeDir == FADE_IN)
00051  {
00052   if(m_Alpha+m_Speed > m_MaxAlpha) m_Alpha = m_MaxAlpha;
00053   else m_Alpha+=m_Speed;
00054  }
00055  if(m_FadeDir == FADE_OUT)
00056  {
00057   if(m_Alpha+m_Speed < 0) m_Alpha = 0;
00058   else m_Alpha-=m_Speed;
00059  }
00060 
00061  if(m_Style == FADE_PULSE)
00062  {
00063   if(m_Alpha == 255) m_FadeDir = FADE_OUT;
00064   else if(m_Alpha == 0) m_FadeDir = FADE_IN;
00065  }
00066  else if(m_Style == FADE_NORMAL)
00067  {
00068   if(ElapsedTime >= m_RunTime/2 ) m_FadeDir = FADE_OUT;
00069   if(m_FadeDir == FADE_OUT && m_Alpha == 0) m_finished = true;
00070  }
00071 
00072  // The developer set a time in the constructor. This effect will last for the given time.
00073  if(ElapsedTime >= m_RunTime)
00074   m_finished = true;
00075 }
00076 
00077 CFlash::~CFlash()
00078 {
00079  SDL_FreeSurface(mp_FadeSurface);
00080 }
